heading: Your Global HR Consulting Guide
intro: Discover how our consulting process works, where we serve clients worldwide, and what to expect when you contact us.

map.heading: Our Global Reach
map.caption: We support clients in North America, South America, Europe, Africa, Asia, the Middle East, and Australia.

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.desc: Submit your enquiry using the form below or contact us directly. We respond within 24 hours to arrange a discovery call.

steps.title: Discovery & Needs Analysis
steps.desc: We hold a video or phone call to understand your business, challenges, and goals. We may request relevant documents or data.

steps.title: Proposal & Agreement
steps.desc: We send a tailored proposal outlining our approach, deliverables, timeline, and pricing. Once agreed, we sign a service agreement.

steps.title: Project Kickoff
steps.desc: We launch the project with a kickoff meeting, set milestones, and establish communication channels.

steps.title: Delivery & Support
steps.desc: We deliver agreed outcomes, provide training or documentation, and offer ongoing support as needed.

expectHeading: What to Expect When You Contact Us
expectations: Prompt, friendly response from our team within 24 hours.
Clear communication about next steps and what we need from you.
Confidentiality and professionalism at every stage.
Personalized solutions tailored to your business needs.
Ongoing support and advice, even after project delivery.

tools.heading: Tools & Frameworks We Use
tools.intro: We use a range of proven business tools and frameworks to help you achieve your goals:

list.name: SWOT Analysis
list.desc: Identify your business strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats.

list.name: Business Model Canvas
list.desc: Visualize and design your business model for clarity and innovation.

list.name: OKR (Objectives & Key Results)
list.desc: Set and track ambitious goals with measurable outcomes.

list.name: KPI (Key Performance Indicators)
list.desc: Monitor your business performance with clear, actionable metrics.

list.name: PESTLE Analysis
list.desc: Assess external factors impacting your business environment.

list.name: Balanced Scorecard
list.desc: Align business activities to the vision and strategy of your organization.

pricing.heading: Our Pricing Plans
pricing.intro: Choose the plan that fits your organisation. All prices are per month, excluding VAT.

cards.title: Enterprise
cards.extra: Tailored for large or complex organisations
cards.details: Contact us for a custom quote.

calculator.heading: Estimate Your Monthly Cost
calculator.intro: Use the calculator below to estimate your monthly fee based on your team size.

hero.sideWriting: We partner with organizations to deliver tailored HR solutions, drive business growth, and support your people every step of the way.
